content: KH-EZ C SS316 Screw anchor Ultimate-performance screw anchor for quicker corrosion-resistant fastenings in concrete and grout-filled CMU (stainless steel 316, countersunk head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time and labor-saving stainless steel screw anchor for concrete – especially suited for seismic, cracked concrete and grout filled CMU applications requiring an ICC approval Quicker and easier to install than wedge anchors – no cleaning, no high-accuracy torque wrench and no hammering required Optimized thread design for exceptional setting performance, superior load values and reduced edge distances and spacing Carbide cutting edges help to ensure easy setting even under critical conditions (such as high-strength concrete, used drill bits, rebar hits) Fully removable anchoring solution for use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special tolerance drill bits required for these screw anchors Applications Structural steel applications Attaching balconies, railings, handrails and signs Installing storage and rack systems Secondary steel attachment ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 316 Head configuration: Countersunk Torx Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Miami Dade County Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 316 | Head configuration | Countersunk Torx | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Indoor, damp conditions, Outdoor | IBC compliance | IBC 2018 | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Stainless steel, 316 ### ITEMS- 2245633 - Screw anchor KH-EZ C SS316 1/4x2-1/2 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x KH-EZ C SS316 1/4x2 1/2 Screw - 0.02x Driver bit - 2245631 - Screw anchor KH-EZ C SS316 1/4x2 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: -
